## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've installed Verus, but I need to find some files. Where can I find the Verus wallet and data files on different operating systems?

**AI Assistant:**
The location of the Verus wallet and data files varies by operating system. On Linux, you can find them in `~/.komodo/VRSC`, on Mac OS in `/Users//Library/Application Support/komodo/VRSC`, and on Windows in `%AppData%\Komodo\VRSC\`. Let me know if you need help with anything else!

**User:**
I have an Enhanced Agama installation, and I need to find the CLI binaries. Where are they located?

**AI Assistant:**
In a Verus Enhanced Agama installation, the CLI binaries are located in the following directories, relative to the installation location of Agama. On Windows, the Verus binaries are in `resources\app\assets\bin\win64\verusd\` (contains `verusd` and `verus`), the Komodo binaries are in `resources\app\assets\bin\win64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`). On Linux, the Verus binaries are in `resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\verusd` (contains `verusd` and `verus`), and the Komodo binaries are in `resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`). Do you have any other questions about this?

**User:**
I have a Verus Desktop installation, and I need to find the CLI binaries. Where are they located?

**AI Assistant:**
In a Verus Desktop installation, the CLI binaries are located in the following directories, relative to the installation location of Verus Desktop. On Windows, the Verus binaries are in `\resources\app\assets\bin\win64\verusd\` (contains `verusd` and `verus`), the Komodo binaries are in `\resources\app\assets\bin\win64\komodod` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`), and the Zcash binaries are in `\resources\app\assets\bin\win64\zcash` (contains `zcashd` and `zcash-cli`). On Linux, the Verus binaries are in `\resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\verusd` (contains `verusd` and `verus`), and the Komodo binaries are in `\resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`). Let me know if you need help with anything else!

**User:**
I want to learn more about Verus. Where can I find more information about Verus, such as the official website, GitHub repository, and block explorers?

**AI Assistant:**
You can find more information about Verus at the following links: the official website is at [https://verus.io](https://verus.io), the GitHub Repository is at [https://github.com/veruscoin](https://github.com/veruscoin), the Main Block Explorer is at [https://explorer.verus.io](https://explorer.verus.io), and the Backup Block Explorer is at [https://explorer.vrsc.0x03.s](https://explorer.vrsc.0x03.s). I hope that helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
Where can I find the Verus wallet and data files on different operating systems?

The location of the Verus wallet and data files varies by operating system:
- Linux: `~/.komodo/VRSC`
- Mac OS: `/Users//Library/Application Support/komodo/VRSC`
- Windows: `%AppData%\Komodo\VRSC\`

Where are the CLI binaries located in a Verus Enhanced Agama installation?

In a Verus Enhanced Agama installation, the CLI binaries are located in the following directories, relative to the installation location of Agama:
- Windows Verus binaries: `resources\app\assets\bin\win64\verusd\` (contains `verusd` and `verus`)
- Windows Komodo binaries: `resources\app\assets\bin\win64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`)
- Linux Verus binaries: `resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\verusd` (contains `verusd` and `verus`)
- Linux Komodo binaries: `resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`)

- Windows Zcash binaries: `\resources\app\assets\bin\win64\zcash` (contains `zcashd` and `zcash-cli`)
- Linux Verus binaries: `\resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\verusd` (contains `verusd` and `verus`)
- Linux Komodo binaries: `\resources\app\assets\bin\linux64\` (contains `komodod` and `komodo-cli`)

Where can I find more information about Verus, such as the official website, GitHub repository, and block explorers?

You can find more information about Verus at the following links:
- Official Website: [https://verus.io](https://verus.io)
- GitHub Repository: [https://github.com/veruscoin](https://github.com/veruscoin)
- Main Block Explorer: [https://explorer.verus.io](https://explorer.verus.io)
- Backup Block Explorer: [https://explorer.vrsc.0x03.s](https://explorer.vrsc.0x03.s)
